name: Seally
description:
Seally is a little, cute seal who must eat all the clownfish, which she can. But the sharks are also hungry, and unfortunately besides the fish they like seals. So they want to eat Seally.

She has to be cautious and forehanded.

This project is in alpha version, even the game concept is under development.

Oh, and some details: you can control Seally with the arrow keys and there is a turbo button, which is still infinite: left-shift. (Seally is quite slow righ now.)
